thread.title: Assistant General Manager - Pasadena - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Assistant General Manager - Pasadena - Sports and Fitness

title: Assistant General Manager - Pasadena - Sports and Fitness
text: Maintains and expands membership and/or customer base by assisting in the prompt handling member and guest concerns and issues; Fosters open communication with members and guests by remaining highly visible.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
